name: encumbered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
prevented from making quick progress by having to carry heavy objects or deal with important duties and responsibilities: She was encumbered by concern over her husband’s health.
Add to word list
Add to word list
LAW, PROPERTY if a property is encumbered, there is a mortgage or other charge on it: Transfer of encumbered property can have negative tax implications.
if a person or an organization is encumbered, there is something that makes it difficult for them to do things: encumbered by/with sth The firm is encumbered by debt, and may need to sell off assets. Online stores are not encumbered with the overheads of high-street stores.
